entry.translation: VOS CAPACITÉS AUDITIVES SONT UNIQUES. PROTÉGEZ-LES!

entry.string: The best protection against noise is to avoid it.
entry.translation: La meilleure protection contre le bruit est de l’éviter.

entry.string: The fight against noise, therefore, begins at its very source.
entry.translation: La lutte contre le bruit commence donc à sa source même.

entry.string: We are the hearing protection specialists and have the solution:
entry.translation: Nous sommes les spécialistes en protection de l’ouïe et avons la solution:
Portez notre protecteur de l’ouïe JRENUM®!

entry.string: We look forward to giving you some advice - free of charge.
entry.translation: C’est avec plaisir que nous vous proposons nos conseils, gracieusement.

entry.string: You need to upgrade your Flash Player
We are looking for country representatives. To apply click

Berend de Boer and Philips and Ruth Poissenot together conceived of a hearing protector that was at once exceptionally effective and comfortable. The product of their work - the Jrenum line of hearing protectors - has proven to be effective in a variety of aurally hazardous environments over many years. "Jrenum" is derived from the ancient Greek word irini, which means peace.
